titleStmt.title: Here is something following of a vision and a few words of prophesie concerning the fall of Babilon, and destruction of her people, this signifies the time at hand, therefore I warn all in the fear of the Lord to turn from the evil of their waies.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Lewis.

notesStmt.note: Top portion of sheet signed: Lewis Rogers. Dated: The 4th of the 7th month 1663.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
